  • Field Details

    • title

      private String title
      represents the title of the game

    • ownerID

      private int ownerID
      represents the ID of the proprietary of the game. It has to be unique

    • description

      private String description
      a brief description of the board game

    • genre

      private Genre genre
      shows the genre to which the board game belongs. It has to be unique

    • ratingList

      private RatingList ratingList
      ArrayList that will store the ratings that the users give the board game

      private GameAction gameAction
      it determines if the book is either free, borrowed or reserved

    • status

      private String status
      it will show if the game is either free, borrowed or reserved

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardGame

      public BoardGame(String title, int ownerID, String description, Genre genre)
      unique class constructor ownerID has to have 6 digits. If it doesn't match the requirement throws an exception both the title and the description fields only can contain spaces and letters. If the provided title doesn't match the requirements, an exception is throw genre will be selected from a list of already settled genres gameAction will be set to null a new RatingList will be created
      Parameters:
      title -
      ownerID -
      description -
      genre -
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for all possible mistakes
